name: dlvr.it
description: One click publishing to the social web.
overview:
dlvr.it is an easy way to syndicate content online.

dlvr.it providers bloggers, publishers and brands, both large and small, with a way to expand their reach on the social web and into new channels. Our tools make it easy to manage and measure the flow of your content everywhere your audience is.

dlvr.it works by taking content from an RSS feed or any number of other inputs and distributing it to audiences via social channels including Twitter and Facebook. It is fast to set up, manage and customize. Users can mix and match content sources that work best for their audience. For example, content from multiple sources can all be distributed through one Twitter stream, alternatively, content from one source can be sent to several outputs.

dlvr.it allows users to see and measure their contentâ€™s reach. With dlvr.it, you can measure how audiences engage with content across the social Web. Bloggers and brands can quantify the impact of retweets and mentions to see who is consuming content and where.

dlvr.it is based in Oakland, California. For more information or to sign up, visit http://dlvr.it/.
